channel.title: Cannot get server online
channel.description:
I cannot get server online after doing everything I was supposed to do.
I portforwarded: [RSPS] [43594] [43594] [Both] [192.168.2.[u]104[/u]] [Enabled]
Set up No-IP: [u]Hostname[/u]: devoscapeftw.no-ip.org [u]Host Type[/u]: DNS Host (A) IP Address: (Not telling but I know it's right)
Downloaded No-IP DUC and host is turned on with the blushing smiley.
I can connect to it using [i]localhost[/i] or 127.0.0.1 but not using the Host name posted above.
Anyone have any ideas??
Help is appreciated

item.title: Cannot get server online
item.dc:creator: @x_Nick_x x Nick x
item.description:
@x_Nick_x wrote:

[quote=“Bryanc, post:9, topic:288562”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=381515.msg2866840#msg2866840 date=1247508922]
OF course you can’t connect to it using your NO-IP. Because it’s running on YOUR computer, YOU have to use 127.0.0.1. …
[/quote]
Do you happen to have teamviewer?[/quote]

Yes I think I do

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot get server online

item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

zyle1992:

OF course you can’t connect to it using your NO-IP. Because it’s running on YOUR computer, YOU have to use 127.0.0.1. …

That is wrong, you can use the no-ip but why would you.

@x Nick x

Do you happen to have teamviewer?

item.title: Cannot get server online
item.dc:creator: @x_Nick_x x Nick x
item.description:
@x_Nick_x wrote:

zyle1992:

OF course you can’t connect to it using your NO-IP. Because it’s running on YOUR computer, YOU have to use 127.0.0.1. Everyone else who’s connecting from there computer MUST use your No-IP address.

But I tried posting the server on Mopar’s server list and it said it was offline?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 12:37:02 pm[/size][hr] :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad:

and please no spamming

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot get server online
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Sorry if that was considered spam, but when I’m at a loss I love to hear a good joke, whether its bad or good, it makes me realize “Hey, atleast i’m not as screwed up as that guy!”

Read full topic

item.title: Cannot get server online
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“fatwallet, post:1, topic:288565”]Not nessecarily…but in this case, I’d give it a try.

[code]
public int yourWeight = 1000;
public int hasset = 0;

public void eatEveryone() {
openMouthAndChew();
swallowWithDelight();
}

public void diePainfully() {
addItem(IronMaiden, 4);
ApplyTorture();
ApplyDead();
ApplyMinceMeat();
ApplySaltAndPepper();
}

public void checkWeight() {
if(yourWeight >= 1000)
eatEveryone();

else {
if(yourWeight <= 10)
diePainfully();
}
[/code][/quote]

That was pure spam… And yes, that’s the way it MUST be.

Read full topic
